EmailTemplate.description: StarTrack Email Template to be used for sending Non-BSC General Consignment Notification.
EmailTemplate.name: StarTrack General Consignment Notification - Customer Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Consignment {!workflow_Email__c.Consignment_Number__c} - StarTrack Case {!workflow_Email__c.Calc_Case_Number__c} has been resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!workflow_Email__c.Calc_Case_Number__c}
Hi {!workflow_Email__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Your enquiry relating to {!workflow_Email__c.Consignment_Number__c} has now been resolved and we're closing your case.
Thank you for contacting our customer service team. If you require further assistance in regards to this consignment and wish to reopen your case, please reply to this email.
Regards,
StarTrack Customer Service Centre
{!workflow_Email__c.Case_Thread_Id__c}
Help & Support | Terms & Conditions | Privacy Policy
